para: Excellent service during our days of travel in India. The driver was very friendly and adept at getting us to our destinations. The car was new and always clean.
name: Rudy Lim

para: I would personally recommend for people to go with Sweet Trip for the cab booking. Save time with headache free journey. Best part is Cab is on time. Thanks Sweet Trip for making my journey happy and smooth.
name: siddhant verma

para: Booked two 7 seaters for a family event and what a smooth experience it has been. On time pick and well behaved helpful drivers. It was actually SWEET TRIP.
name: RAJKUMAR THAKUR

para: Very helpful and co operative. Helped me in an emergency situation. Good car and experienced driver. Only thing is they are a bit costly. Worth the money though.
name: Vedatrayee Mudra

para: Good experience. Driver and the agency very helpful throughout the journey. I've been taking their cab services for a while now and every time the service is impeccable and they're very understanding.
name: Kirtika Rudra

para: I was not having any idea about this rental. I did the booking all by myself online. However the person from Sweet trip.Is extremely reliable, genuine price...
name: Goutami Sarkar
